# Aspect ratio



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

The Aspect ratio component forces elements within it to maintain a specific aspect ratio.

## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                         | Type                                                                                        | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `fullWidth` | `full-width` | Determines if the component expands to fill the available horizontal space.         | `boolean \| undefined`                                                                      | `undefined` |
| `ratio`     | `ratio`      | The desired aspect ratio, specified as a number (e.g., 16/9 or 4/3).                | `` `${number}/${number}` ``                                                                 | `'16/9'`    |
| `width`     | `width`      | The width in px or percentage. Token variables and calc strings are also supported. | `` `${number}%` \| `${number}px` \| `calc(${string})` \| `var(--${string})` \| undefined `` | `'100%'`    |


## Slots

| Slot | Description                                   |
| ---- | --------------------------------------------- |
|      | Passes content to the Aspect ratio component. |


----------------------------------------------
